content.content: 1. Any form required to be prescribed under the Act shall be in the form approved by the Minister and provided by the Ministry, except as set out in sections 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 and 10. O. Reg. 241/00, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Any form required to be prescribed under the Act shall be in the form approved by the Minister and provided by the Ministry, except as set out in sections 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 and 10. O. Reg. 241/00, s. 1.

content.content: 2. An application to record a staked mining claim under subsection 44 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 1. O. Reg. 503/96, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 2. An application to record a staked mining claim under subsection 44 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 1. O. Reg. 503/96, s. 1.

content.content: 3. A transfer of an unpatented mining claim or any interest in an unpatented mining claim shall be in Form 2. O. Reg. 503/96, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 3. A transfer of an unpatented mining claim or any interest in an unpatented mining claim shall be in Form 2. O. Reg. 503/96, s. 1.

content.content: 4. (1) Assessment work referred to in subsection 65 (2) of the Act and exploration work referred to in subsection 66 (3) of the Act shall be declared in Form 3 if the work has been performed on mining lands. O. Reg. 503/96, s. 1. (2) Prospecting and regional surveys on Crown land referred to in subsection 66 (2) of the Act shall be declared in Form 4. O. Reg. 503/96, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
4. (1) Assessment work referred to in subsection 65 (2) of the Act and exploration work referred to in subsection 66 (3) of the Act shall be declared in Form 3 if the work has been performed on mining lands. O. Reg. 503/96, s. 1.

(2) Prospecting and regional surveys on Crown land referred to in subsection 66 (2) of the Act shall be declared in Form 4. O. Reg. 503/96, s. 1.

content.content: 5. A notice of intention to perform assessment work under section 78 of the Act shall be in Form 5. O. Reg. 503/96, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 5. A notice of intention to perform assessment work under section 78 of the Act shall be in Form 5. O. Reg. 503/96, s. 1.

content.content: 6. A notice of project status under clause 140 (1) (a) or 141 (1) (a) or subsection 144 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 6. O. Reg. 241/00, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 6. A notice of project status under clause 140 (1) (a) or 141 (1) (a) or subsection 144 (1) of the Act shall be in Form 6. O. Reg. 241/00, s. 2.

content.content: 7. A notice of material change under subsection 144 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 7. O. Reg. 241/00, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 7. A notice of material change under subsection 144 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 7. O. Reg. 241/00, s. 2.

content.content: 8. An inspection warrant under subsection 146 (5) of the Act shall be in Form 8. O. Reg. 241/00, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 8. An inspection warrant under subsection 146 (5) of the Act shall be in Form 8. O. Reg. 241/00, s. 2.

content.content: 9. A search warrant under subsection 146 (6) of the Act shall be in Form 9. O. Reg. 241/00, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 9. A search warrant under subsection 146 (6) of the Act shall be in Form 9. O. Reg. 241/00, s. 2.

content.content: 10. A notice to require a hearing under Part VII of the Act shall be in Form 10. O. Reg. 241/00, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 10. A notice to require a hearing under Part VII of the Act shall be in Form 10. O. Reg. 241/00, s. 2.

content.content: 27. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 111/91, s. 27.
content.raw_html: 27. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 111/91, s. 27.
